snippet: The tsunami sent strong waves crashing into several South Pacific islands, with officials in the Solomon Islands saying that at least four people died.
abstract: Powerful magnitude 8 earthquake causes tsunami that sends strong waves crashing into several South Pacific islands, with officials in Solomon Islands saying at least four people died.

byline.original: By SUZANNE McFADDEN and GERRY MULLANY
byline.contributor: Suzanne McFadden reported from Auckland, and Gerry Mullany from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: The tsunami sent strong waves crashing into several South Pacific islands, with officials in the Solomon Islands saying that at least four people died.

headline.seo: Tsunami Causes Deaths and Damages Homes on Solomon Islands
headline.main: Tsunami Causes Deaths and Damages Homes on Solomon Islands
headline.print_headline:
Solomon Islands: Six Bodies Found
After Tsunami Destroys Villages
